title: Sans serif
author: VITAMINADO

comments.content:
Benchnine Bold appears to be a match (right down to the unusual lowercase g):

[http://www.whatfontis.com/BenchNine-Bold.font?text=CASTELO](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140329/http:/www.whatfontis.com/BenchNine-Bold.font?text=CASTELO "http://www.whatfontis.com/BenchNine-Bold.font?text=CASTELO") DE PENALVA

[http://code.newtypography.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140329/http:/code.newtypography.co.uk/ "http://code.newtypography.co.uk/")
